00059 static inline 
00060 double get_delta_C( const PatchData& pd,
00061                     const std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00062                     MsqError& err )
00063 {
00064   if (indices.empty()) {
00065     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00066     return 0.0;
00067   }
00068 
00069   std::vector<size_t>::const_iterator beg, iter, iter2, end;
00070   
00071   std::vector<size_t> tmp_vect;
00072   if (indices.size() == 1u) {
00073     pd.get_adjacent_vertex_indices( indices.front(), tmp_vect, err );
00074     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00075     assert(!tmp_vect.empty());
00076     tmp_vect.push_back( indices.front() );
00077     beg = tmp_vect.begin();
00078     end = tmp_vect.end();
00079   }
00080   else {
00081     beg = indices.begin();
00082     end = indices.end();
00083   }
00084   
00085   double min_dist_sqr = HUGE_VAL, sum_dist_sqr = 0.0;
00086   for (iter = beg; iter != end; ++iter) {
00087     for (iter2 = iter+1; iter2 != end; ++iter2) {
00088       Vector3D diff = pd.vertex_by_index(*iter);
00089       diff -= pd.vertex_by_index(*iter2);
00090       double dist_sqr = diff % diff;
00091       if (dist_sqr < min_dist_sqr)
00092         min_dist_sqr = dist_sqr;
00093       sum_dist_sqr += dist_sqr;
00094     }
00095   }
00096   
00097   return 3e-6*sqrt(min_dist_sqr) + 5e-7*sqrt(sum_dist_sqr/(end-beg));
00098 }

00100 
00101 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_gradient( PatchData& pd,
00102                               size_t handle,
00103                               double& value,
00104                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00105                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00106                               MsqError& err )
00107 {
00108   indices.clear();
00109   bool valid = evaluate_with_indices( pd, handle, value, indices, err);
00110   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00111     return false;
00112   if (indices.empty())
00113     return true;
00114 
00115     // get initial pertubation amount
00116   double delta_C = finiteDiffEps;
00117   if (!haveFiniteDiffEps) {
00118     delta_C = get_delta_C( pd, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00119     if (keepFiniteDiffEps) {
00120       finiteDiffEps = delta_C;
00121       haveFiniteDiffEps = true;
00122     }
00123   }
00124   const double delta_inv_C = 1.0/delta_C;
00125   const int reduction_limit = 15;
00126 
00127   gradient.resize( indices.size() );
00128   for (size_t v=0; v<indices.size(); ++v) 
00129   {
00130     const Vector3D pos = pd.vertex_by_index(indices[v]);
00131     
00132     /* gradient in the x, y, z direction */
00133     for (int j=0;j<3;++j) 
00134     {
00135       double delta = delta_C;
00136       double delta_inv = delta_inv_C;
00137       double metric_value;
00138       Vector3D delta_v( 0, 0, 0 );
00139       
00140         //perturb the node and calculate gradient.  The while loop is a
00141         //safety net to make sure the epsilon perturbation does not take
00142         //the element out of the feasible region.
00143       int counter = 0;
00144       for (;;) {
00145           // perturb the coordinates of the free vertex in the j direction
00146           // by delta       
00147         delta_v[j] = delta;
00148         pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos+delta_v, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00149 
00150           //compute the function at the perturbed point location
00151         valid = evaluate( pd, handle, metric_value, err);
00152         if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err) && valid) 
00153           break;
00154           
00155         if (++counter >= reduction_limit) {
00156           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Perturbing vertex by delta caused an inverted element.",
00157                           MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00158           return false;
00159         }
00160         
00161         delta*=0.1;
00162         delta_inv*=10.;
00163       }
00164         // put the coordinates back where they belong
00165       pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos, indices[v], err );
00166         // compute the numerical gradient
00167       gradient[v][j] = (metric_value - value) * delta_inv;
00168     } // for(j)
00169   } // for(indices)
00170   return true;
00171 }

00173 
00174 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian( PatchData& pd,
00175                               size_t handle,
00176                               double& value,
00177                               std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00178                               std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00179                               std::vector<Matrix3D>& Hessian,
00180                               MsqError& err )
00181 {
00182   indices.clear();
00183   gradient.clear();
00184   keepFiniteDiffEps = true;
00185   bool valid = evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, err );
00186   keepFiniteDiffEps = false;
00187   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid) {
00188     haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00189     return false;
00190   }
00191   if (indices.empty()){
00192     haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00193     return true;
00194   }
00195 
00196     // get initial pertubation amount
00197   double delta_C;
00198   if (haveFiniteDiffEps) {
00199     delta_C = finiteDiffEps;
00200   }
00201   else {
00202     delta_C = get_delta_C( pd, indices, err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00203   }
00204   assert(delta_C < 1e30);
00205   const double delta_inv_C = 1.0/delta_C;
00206   const int reduction_limit = 15;
00207 
00208   std::vector<Vector3D> temp_gradient( indices.size() );
00209   const int num_hess = indices.size() * (indices.size() + 1) / 2;
00210   Hessian.resize( num_hess );
00211   
00212   for (unsigned v = 0; v < indices.size(); ++v) {
00213     const Vector3D pos = pd.vertex_by_index(indices[v]);
00214     for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) { // x, y, and z
00215       double delta = delta_C;
00216       double delta_inv = delta_inv_C;
00217       double metric_value;
00218       Vector3D delta_v(0,0,0);
00219       
00220         // find finite difference for gradient
00221       int counter = 0;
00222       for (;;) {
00223         delta_v[j] = delta;
00224         pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos+delta_v, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00225         valid = evaluate_with_gradient( pd, handle, metric_value, indices, temp_gradient, err );
00226         if (!MSQ_CHKERR(err) && valid) 
00227           break;
00228         
00229         if (++counter >= reduction_limit) {
00230           MSQ_SETERR(err)("Algorithm did not successfully compute element's "
00231                            "Hessian.\n",MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR);
00232           haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00233           return false;
00234         }
00235         
00236         delta *= 0.1;
00237         delta_inv *= 10.0;
00238       }
00239       pd.set_vertex_coordinates( pos, indices[v], err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00240       
00241         //compute the numerical Hessian
00242       for (unsigned w = 0; w <= v; ++w) {
00243           //finite difference to get some entries of the Hessian
00244         Vector3D fd( temp_gradient[w] );
00245         fd -= gradient[w];
00246         fd *= delta_inv;
00247           // For the block at position w,v in a matrix, we need the corresponding index
00248           // (mat_index) in a 1D array containing only upper triangular blocks.
00249         unsigned sum_w = w*(w+1)/2; // 1+2+3+...+w
00250         unsigned mat_index = w*indices.size() + v - sum_w;
00251         Hessian[mat_index][0][j] = fd[0];
00252         Hessian[mat_index][1][j] = fd[1];
00253         Hessian[mat_index][2][j] = fd[2];
00254       }
00255     }  // for(j)
00256   } // for(indices)
00257   haveFiniteDiffEps = false;
00258   return true;
00259 }
00260 
00261 bool QualityMetric::evaluate_with_Hessian_diagonal( PatchData& pd,
00262                                 size_t handle,
00263                                 double& value,
00264                                 std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00265                                 std::vector<Vector3D>& gradient,
00266                                 std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& Hessian_diagonal,
00267                                 MsqError& err )
00268 {
00269   bool rval = evaluate_with_Hessian( pd, handle, value, indices, gradient, tmpHess, err );
00270   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00271     return rval;
00272   size_t s = indices.size();
00273   Hessian_diagonal.resize( s );
00274   std::vector<Matrix3D>::const_iterator h = tmpHess.begin();
00275   for (size_t i = 0; i < indices.size(); ++i) {
00276     Hessian_diagonal[i] = h->upper();
00277     h += s--;
00278   }
00279   return rval;
00280 }
00281 
00282 
00283 uint32_t QualityMetric::fixed_vertex_bitmap( PatchData& pd,
00284                                            const MsqMeshEntity* elem,
00285                                            std::vector<size_t>& indices )
00286 {
00287   indices.clear();
00288   uint32_t result = ~(uint32_t)0;
00289   unsigned num_vtx = elem->vertex_count();
00290   const size_t* vertices = elem->get_vertex_index_array();
00291   indices.clear();
00292   for (unsigned i = 0; i < num_vtx; ++i) {
00293     if (vertices[i] < pd.num_free_vertices()) {
00294       indices.push_back( vertices[i] );
00295       result &= ~(uint32_t)(1<<i);
00296     }
00297   }
00298   return result;
00299 }

00301 
00302 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_gradients( EntityTopology elem_type,
00303                                           uint32_t fixed,
00304                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grads )
00305 {
00306   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( elem_type );
00307   unsigned r, w;
00308   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex && !(fixed & (1<<r)); ++r);
00309   for (w = r++; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00310     if (!(fixed & (1<<r))) {
00311       grads[w] = grads[r];
00312       ++w;
00313     }
00314   }
00315   grads.resize(w);
00316 }
00317 
00318 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_diagonals( EntityTopology type, 
00319                                           uint32_t fixed, 
00320                                           std::vector<Vector3D>& grads,
00321                                           std::vector<SymMatrix3D>& diags )
00322 {
00323   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( type );
00324   unsigned r, w;
00325   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex && !(fixed & (1<<r)); ++r);
00326   for (w = r++; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00327     if (!(fixed & (1<<r))) {
00328       grads[w] = grads[r];
00329       diags[w] = diags[r];
00330       ++w;
00331     }
00332   }
00333   grads.resize(w);
00334   diags.resize(w);
00335 }
00336 
00337 void QualityMetric::remove_fixed_hessians( EntityTopology elem_type,
00338                                          uint32_t fixed,
00339                                          std::vector<Matrix3D>& hessians )
00340 {
00341   const unsigned num_vertex = TopologyInfo::corners( elem_type );
00342   unsigned r, c, i = 0, w = 0;
00343   for (r = 0; r < num_vertex; ++r) {
00344     if (fixed & (1<<r)) {
00345       i += num_vertex - r;
00346       continue;
00347     }
00348     for (c = r; c < num_vertex; ++c) {
00349       if (!(fixed & (1<<c))) {
00350         hessians[w] = hessians[i];
00351         ++w;
00352       }
00353       ++i;
00354     }
00355   }
00356   hessians.resize(w);
00357 }      
00358 
00359 double QualityMetric::weighted_average_metrics(const double coef[],
00360                                              const double metric_values[],
00361                                              const int& num_values, 
00362                                              MsqError &err)
00363 {
00364   //MSQ_MAX needs to be made global?
00365   //double MSQ_MAX=1e10;
00366   double total_value=0.0;
00367   int i=0;
00368   //if no values, return zero
00369   if (num_values<=0){
00370     return 0.0;
00371   }
00372 
00373   for (i=0;i<num_values;++i){
00374     total_value += coef[i]*metric_values[i];
00375   }
00376   total_value /= (double) num_values;
00377 
00378   return total_value;
00379 }
